A real number.

Quaternion chain::DIFF ( const Quaternion &  orig,
const Quaternion &  dest 
)

Calculate the rotation between two normalised quaternion rotations. This is the same as q1 * (-q2)

Parameters:
orig - First rotation
dest - Second rotation
Returns:
Quaternion - result quaternion
See also:
Quaternion::operator*()
